description: Nagisa`s father. Although he often talks and plays rough, he is kind and sympathetic. His childish side makes it easy for people to befriend him. He runs the Furukawa Bakery with his wife Sanae. In his spare time, Akio plays baseball with children in the small park next to the bakery, and indulges in the Gundam fandom. He is often the victim of Sanae`s bread, especially when Sanae runs around the town crying due to his accidental bad remark about her bread, and always have to eat her bread in front of her to calm Sanae down.
name: Furukawa Akio
